Name: 1st District
Description: The heart of Athens, known for its historical landmarks, including the Acropolis and the Parthenon.

Name: 2nd District
Description: A bustling district filled with vibrant neighborhoods, restaurants, and nightlife.

Name: 3rd District
Description: A central district with a mix of residential and commercial areas, home to many government buildings.

Name: 4th District
Description: A vibrant and artsy district, home to galleries, theatres, and cultural venues.

Name: 5th District
Description: A more residential area with local shops, green spaces, and family-friendly amenities.
